name: Cobox (MCMGameStudio, playfuldoggo, DeadPie)
description:
——Description——

Welcome to Cobox, a game of puzzles, planning, and positioning!

Fit your way through 6 levels as you try to connect all the boxes sprinkled throughout. Be careful though, as once you connect to a box, you won't be able to change its position, which might mean you can't squeeze through the goal. 

——Controls——

Movement - WASD

Turn camera - Q/E

Reset level - R

Pause - P

All keybinds can be changed in the options menu

——Credits——

DeadPieGamer - Programming

Playfuldoggo - SFX

TinyGod - Music and Level Design

bit#7212 - Art

——Jam Build——

If you wanna try the original version of Cobox, with all of its bugs and fewer levels (why would you?), it can be found here
